meta.description: Optimize the number of carrier pigeons and owls used to maximize the total number of letters sent.

sets.name: BIRDS
sets.description: Types of birds used for sending letters.

params.name: letters_per_bird
params.description: Number of letters each type of bird can carry.

params.name: treats_per_bird
params.description: Number of treats required for each type of bird.

params.name: min_carrier_pigeons
params.description: Minimum number of carrier pigeons that must be used.

params.name: max_owl_ratio
params.description: Maximum ratio of birds that can be owls.

vars.name: num_birds
vars.description: Number of each type of bird used.

objective.name: max_total_letters
objective.description: Maximize the total number of letters that can be sent.

constraints.name: treats_constraint
constraints.description: Total treats used by all birds must not exceed available treats.

constraints.name: min_carrier_pigeons_constraint
constraints.description: At least 20 carrier pigeons must be used.

constraints.name: max_owl_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: At most 40% of the birds can be owls.
